channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.2.4
item.description:
• PostgreSQL 11.4 with PostGIS 2.5.2
  • PostgreSQL 10.9 with PostGIS 2.4.7
  • PostgreSQL 9.6.14 with PostGIS 2.3.9
  • PostgreSQL 9.5.18 with PostGIS 2.2.8

PostgreSQL 12beta2 is available separately and can be download from postgresapp.com/downloads.html
